typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GDP
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string,
		SpecialNotes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
GDP, source2 join({Country Name} == TableName,
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Country Name},
		{Indicator Name},
		{2002},
		{2003},
		{2004},
		{2005},
		{2006},
		{2007},
		{2008},
		{2009},
		{2010},
		{2011},
		{2012},
		{2013},
		{2014},
		{2015},
		{2016},
		{Country Code},
		Region,
		IncomeGroup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(equals({Country Name}, "Australia")) ~> Ausy
Ausy keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Select1 filter(!equals({Country Name}, "Australia")) ~> NotAusy
NotAusy keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
SurrogateKey2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
